changeSet.author: vikas11.sangal
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE [ViWeb].[AddVIWebViewParameter] @hspcd varchar(50), @docID varchar(5000), @id int output AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM [ViWeb].[VIWebViewDocument] WHERE hspCode=@hspcd and [docID]=@docID) BEGIN INSERT INTO [ViWeb].[VIWebViewDocument](hspCode,[docID]) VALUES (@hspcd,@docID) SET @id=SCOPE_IDENTITY() RETURN @id END ELSE BEGIN SELECT @id = ID FROM [ViWeb].[VIWebViewDocument] WHERE hspCode=@hspcd and [docID]=@docID END END
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON ViWeb.AddVIWebViewParameter TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON ViWeb.AddVIWebViewParameter FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE ViWeb.AddVIWebViewParameter;
